main event: A UFO was observed in Riverside, California on December 24, 1955, initially appearing stationary before accelerating to approximately 300 mph.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for fifteen minutes and began around 8:40 PM., The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 9,000 feet., The UFO was approximately 300 feet in size and self-illuminated., The report states that there was no correlation with known air traffic., Observations were described as ground-visual.
